description:
DRESSED TO IMPRESS!
This modernised and refurbished home is in an excellent location only a short walk to beach and Central Cowes.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a central living zone that leads to the outdoor decking.
The kitchen presents stainless steel appliances an electric oven, gas cook top and plenty of cupboard and bench space.
Other features include carpet to the bedrooms and floor boards throughout, 2 split systems and a double carport.
Contact us today for more information.

FANTASTIC OUTLOOK
This is one of the very few last remaining blocks along Red Rocks Road. With a great outlook across surrounding rural farmland and views across the Bay makes this the perfect block to build your next dream home.

Opportunity Awaits!
Positioned on a large 948sqm block in central Cowes, walking distance to both the town centre and the foreshore, this property would be perfect for a holiday or investment property. The large block has potential for subdivision S.T.C.A.
The home has a functional floorplan, with open plan living / kitchen / dining, 4 bedrooms, separate bathroom, 2 toilets and separate laundry. The options are endless, renovate, rebuild or re-develop!
With limited properties in this price range - this one won't last! Arrange an inspection today!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

HUGE 2000M2 (approx) IN THE MIDDLE OF PHILLIP ISLAND
DEVELOPERS TAKE NOTE!!!
This is a rare opportunity to purchase a unique piece of land in the middle of Phillip Island. The property currently boasts a modest 3 bedroom home and a single garage, allowing you the opportunity to enjoy this unique property and develop at a later date subject to council approval.

ASPIRE DESIGNED HOME - QUIET COURT
Special Features: SALT WATER SWIMMING POOL
This property is the one you have been waiting for. A rare opportunity to purchase a unique home of display quality in the New & Exclusive Shearwater Estate on Phillip Island.
As you enter your new home you are greeted with plenty of light giving you that airy open feeling.
The 1st living area adjoins the kitchen and dining area with stunning engineered timber floors that offer a full northerly aspect with a feature wood heater and split system that offers year round climate-controlled comfort, the large gourmet kitchen offers 900mm hot plates & oven, dishwasher, stone benches with a large island bench and walk in butler's pantry, that makes this home the ideal entertainer.
Double stacker doors open onto a large private undercover deck overlooking the salt water solar heated swimming pool and spacious child & pet friendly backyard is a great place to sit back, relax and enjoy your time with family and friends.
The master bedroom offers full ensuite facilities with walk in robe, this area also offers direct access to the outdoor living area and the walk through office overlooks the outdoor living space.
The second living area is designed to be away for privacy and offers access to the remaining three bedrooms and 2nd bathroom.
The large custom oversized double garage has plenty of room for additional storage and room down the side for the boat or caravan. A quality home that is sure to impress. Call Now for a private viewing.

LOCATION, LOCATION
In any direction you head you are in the midst of Phillip Island known for great beaches and even better surf. Phillip Island has it all to see, koalas, penguins, Grand Prix track, cliff top walks and dunes to explore.
You are only 100 metres approx to the Main Street of Cowes, bustling with wonderful eateries, local shops and a variety of sights to see! Throw a line in at the jetty or catch a boat to explore the coast line.
This quaint home positioned on a block approx 660sqm has the potential to subdivide (STCA).
Comprising 2 bedrooms, alcove kitchen, family bathroom, separate laundry, north facing lounge, Coonara wood heater and free standing single garage.
We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au
Property Code: 611

RED ROCK RETREAT
Located within easy walking distance to Red Rocks Beach this property would make it the ideal beach getaway. Complete with 3 bedrooms ensuite to master, 2 bathrooms, double garage, 2 reverse cycle heating & cooling units.This quiet pocket is located only five minutes drive into Cowes and has one of the best beach's on the Island.

SPACIOUS HOME IN CENTRAL LOCATION
This stunning spacious home is perfectly located one block from the main shopping area and a short 400 metre stroll to the popular “Lovers Walk” foreshore beach.
Designed for a large family, the home offers 5 bedrooms with large built in robes and 2 living areas. Three of the bedrooms are on the upper level surrounding a centrally located bathroom with spa bath and family living room area which extends onto an east facing balcony, The lower level provides a further two bedrooms, the master includes an en-suite with spa bath and walk in robe, large laundry with plenty of storage space, powder room, a generous well appointed kitchen with walk in pantry, and an open plan living and dining zone which opens onto a private court yard and extensive decking area. The home has split system heating and cooling in both upstairs and downstairs living areas as well as each of the 5 bedrooms, ducted vacuum system throughout the house and under stairs storage.
The property is situated on a fully fenced corner block with paved driveway and pathways, landscaped gardens and single car garage with rear access to the alfresco area as well as one separate car space. There is also room at the side of the house for secure boat storage.
Currently utilised as popular holiday accommodation, this property has the potential for an immediate income stream or enjoy the spacious layout as a permanent residence. With its immaculate presentation and proximity to the foreshore beach and main restaurant/shopping district, this property is sure to move quickly. Arrange your inspection without delay.

RED ROCKS RETREAT
This little gem is tucked away in a quiet court this property is perfect for your holiday retreat. Comprising 2 bedrooms, open plan kitchen, dining and living area, large front decking area to entertain, polished timber floors, renovated bathroom and kitchen area all set out on a large block over 800sqm. Located on 5 minutes drive to Cowes and within walking distance of Red Rocks beach. Property will include all furniture.

Looking for great value, beachside family living?
Positioned on a large 725sqm (approx) low maintenance corner allotment, in the popular Seagrove Estate, within close walking distance to the north facing bay beach, and to the Cowes shopping precinct, local schools and amenities, is this fabulous family home.
This double story residence, would be perfect for permanent living, an ideal holiday home, or as a fantastic addition to your investment portfolio.
The home is complete with 3 spacious bedrooms, plus a study or 4th bedroom, 2 living areas, and 2 bathrooms. The upstairs living has been designed to make the most of the elevated position and distant water glimpses from the undercover decking, with cafe blinds to allow year round entertaining.
Also featuring:- Double garage, split system heating and cooling, gas ducted heating to lower level, polished timber flooring, dishwasher, 2 water tanks, and 6 x solar panels.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Phillip Island.

CUTE HOLIDAY SHACK OR DEVELOPMENT SITE
This holiday shack boasts a prime location, situated 200 metres to Cowes renowned lovers walk beach and is centrally located to Cowes shops, restaurants and facilities.
Offering three bedrooms, two bathrooms, split system heating and cooling plus front and rear entertaining decks. This property comes fully furnished and will not last long!
Make this your own seaside escape or development opportunity.

SEAGROVE ESTATE
The Peninsula View release features elevated home sites with views north across the bay towards the Mornington Peninsula and secluded acre lots set amongst mature eucalypts.
All home sites in the Peninsula View release feature an underground gas (LPG) network and are part of the National Broadband Network.
Titles are available now so you can commence building your new home straight away.

QUIET COURT POSITION
Tucked away in a very quiet court approximately 1.2km from the beautiful bay beach and the heart of town, close to the restaurants and shopping district of Cowes.Consisting of four large bedrooms all with built in robes, two bathrooms (ensuite to the master and walk in robe), open plan living/dining and a second living which is currently utilized as the games and entertaining area.
A spacious back deck with fixed seating enhances the relaxing space which flows from the set of double sliding doors to the dining/living area.
This property conveniently includes some of the furniture, whitegoods, bar-b-q, outdoor furniture and outdoor speakers, 2 X video arcade games are also included.

A Great First Home/Invester
Central to everything
Situated in the tranquil Shaolhaven Estate, this delightful residence is convenient to everything and only six months old.
The home offers three bedrooms, all with built-ins, a modern bathroom, with separate toilet, and a spacious open-plan living area overlooking the wetlands, currently under development. The living area has reverse cycle air-conditioning and the spacious kitchen has electric cooker, wall oven and a dishwasher.
Everything is new, ready for immediate occupation; just move in with nothing left to do. The home is a five to ten-minute walk to the beautiful Red Rocks Beach where nature often puts on spectacular sunsets. The Cowes shopping precinct, where there are supermarkets, medical facilities, restaurants and wonderful coffee and specialty shops, is also within walking distance.
From the end of the estate, buses are available to Newhaven College and Wonthaggi Secondary College. Cowes Primary School is only down the road, easily accessible by foot or bike. There is also a regular V-line service to Melbourne from Cowes. For those who fancy a tee, the Phillip Island Golf Club is just on the other end of Cowes and for keen anglers, the beach is virtually a stone's throw away. Cowes Jetty is also a popular location for a spot of fishing.
While the swimming beach is just down the road, Cat Bay, part of the National Surfing Reserve and the beaches of the Summerland Peninsula, is only a 5-minute trip by car, as are the Penguin Parade and the Nobbies Centre. For landlubbers, the Cowes Recreation Reserve provides opportunities to participate in team sports and a workout at the YMCA.
Either as an investment property, holiday home or an opportunity for first home buyers, this residence is a perfect package. And with such a perfect price, it will not remain long on the market. Contact Leanne Poulton on 0437 441 127 to arrange an inspection. This home will win you over.
Offering
• Three bedrooms with built-ins.
• Spacious open-plan living and dining areas.
• Modern bathroom and a separate toilet.
• Contemporary kitchen with ample storage, electric cooking and
dishwasher.
• Reverse cycle air-conditioning in the living area.
• Large backyard.
• Central to Cowes township, beaches, schools and tourist
venues.

Perfect Investment / Holiday Home
All the bases have been covered with this property, set over a full block, the north facing entertaining area is perfect for those long afternoons entertaining family and friends.
With permanent rental in short supply this is the ideal home with all the extra storage.
It has excellent access to Cowes central and Cowes beach.
An excellent way to get started with your first investment property or just secure a well placed home for the future.

BIG BLOCK CLOSE TO THE BEACH
Only a few doors from a sandy track to a beautiful north facing beach and close to town central, this block will provide you with lots of options. Approx 650m2, with over 21m of frontage, this block is ready for the dream home, or maybe a 2 lot subdivision, subject to Council approval. Inspect today, offers invited.

NEW CONTEMPORARY HOME OPPOSITE THE PARK
Selling now in a prime location opposite the park in Whytesands that offers sporting facilities and amenities great for the whole family.
Located close only a short drive to local shops, Cafes, Schools and much more Cowes has to offer
Built by one of our local award winning volume builders this home offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a second large living room great for entertaining guests or Media room to watch the footy.
The spacious open plan kitchen living & dining, with built in pantry opens up to a large north facing rear covered alfresco area.
Open up the double sliding doors and utilise this space to create another room of the home perfect for BBQ area and relaxing with family and friends.
Designed specifically for this allotment by the owner and full of inclusions this home ticks all the boxes. Walking in you will can see that detail has been on the mind from timber floorboards running the full length of the home, blending the warm soft colour tones with the modern contemporary kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops.
Call today to find out what more this home has to offer and come along to our open or book your private inspection. Phone 5952 2633.

Modern, beachside living in heart of Cowes
Modern, beachside living in heart of Cowes
Ideal for first homebuyers or investors, this pristine, recently renovated apartment is thoughtfully designed to embrace sleek, stylish living. Embracing a central address in the heart of central Cowes and merely footsteps to the stunning, north facing Cowes beach, shopping strip, bus station and an array of dining and entertainment options.
This modern, light filled interiors with open plan living makes it perfect for the weekend getaway, consisting of two generous sized bedrooms with easy access central bathroom/laundry. This ultra-convenient, low maintenance lifestyle is an ideal entry point or smart investment.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

TRUE BEACH HOUSE ON A LARGE ALLOTMENT
If you are looking for a well-priced beach house central to Cowes look no further.
Location is everything here with direct walking tracks to parks and schools on your side boundary.
This home has been opened up to give you the open plan feel that we all love, The open kitchen living dining backs onto the rear deck overlooking your vast year yard.
In addition you have beautiful timber floorboards throughout and with 3 bedrooms and a large family bathroom this property ticks many boxes.
Situated on Approximately 910m2 you have the potential to subdivide STCA
Call today to book in your inspection or find out about our next open for inspection (03) 5952 2633.

STYLISH TOWNHOUSE
Modern townhouse tucked securely in a gated community resort only 100m from the beautiful Cowes foreshore Beach.
The home has been beautifully designed with space for the entire family. The upper level features two bedrooms with inbuilt wardrobes, family bathroom, modern kitchen, stylish open plan dining and lounge area with large light filled windows and access to an upper level balcony.
The lower level offers two bedrooms, family bathroom and European laundry. The home has an attached spacious double car garage with inbuilt secure cupboards. The rear courtyard offers a private retreat with space to relax in the sun with a coffee and good book.
Additional features include full security system and split system heating and cooling on both levels.
The home is located in a small secure community with dual gated access and resort style facilities including in-ground heated pool and community bbq and eating area, and is located a short stroll from the Cowes foreshore beach and yacht club.
Immaculately presented and ready to enjoy, secure this beautiful property in time for Summer. Arrange your private inspection today.

STUNNING VIEWS IN PRIME LOCATION
This apartment is absolutely stunning, with bay views and fully equipped with all amenities you could desire to enjoy a tranquil weekender or investment.
This property boats one spacious bedroom suite with double lounge area looking after the sparkling bay. The second living area is fully equipped with a kitchen, dining and provisions for a second bedroom space, ensuring the property can comfortably accommodate four.
Situated across the road from the family friendly Cowes foreshore bay beach, this property is easy living at its best! Stroll across the road and enjoy the children’s playground, local restaurants and bars, shopping precincts and of course the beach.
Additional facilities include an electrical awning covering the balcony with shade, split system, extra cabinetry in the kitchen and bathroom, garden hose on the balcony, and security doors.
This apartment is certainly a stand out on the third floor of the Waves complex, the building is fully equipped with lift facilities and car parking.
At this price, with water views you can’t go wrong, a perfect investment for you and the family.
Book an inspection today.
